actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from OMB, VA.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide mortgage protection life insurance to certain veterans unable to acquire commercial life insurance because of service-connected disabilities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to provide mortgage protection life insurance to certain veterans unable to obtain commercial life insurance at a standard rate because of service-connected disabilities. Establishes guidelines for such insurance regarding: (1) amount of insurance; (2) premium rates; (3) payment of insurance; and (4) policy provisions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide mortgage protection life insurance to certain veterans unable to acquire commercial life insurance because of service-connected disabilities.
